net.myorb.math.primenumbers

Class FactorizationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.primenumbers.ImplementationAccess

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FactorizationManagerTest

    public class FactorizationManager
extends ImplementationAccess
    an encapsulation of logic that performs prime factorization
